exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label y="223" textColor="0x040000" size="15" fontFamily="微软雅黑" id="deviceLabel" width="364" height="221" x="68" textAlign="right"/>
	<e:Image id="lockBtn" source="home_thxbg_jpg" x="174" y="406" height="173" width="133"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LockSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="640" height="1136" fillColor="0x6FEAEA"/>
	<e:Rect width="550" height="232" y="178" fillColor="0xF5FAFA" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="okBtn" source="ok_png" y="804" x="321" anchorOffsetX="100" anchorOffsetY="100"/>
	<e:Image id="headImg" source="head0_png" x="70" y="228"/>
	<e:Label text="我是" x="222" y="226" textColor="0x030000" width="68" height="42" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
	<e:Label y="266" textColor="0x030000" text="根据大屏幕提示，完成校准，一起游戏吧！" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="350" height="128" x="222"/>
	<e:Label id="nameLabel" y="226" text="悠悠熊猫" fontFamily="微软雅黑" width="148" height="42" x="290" textAlign="center" textColor="0xF90101"/>
	<e:Label id="msgLabel" text="校准完成请等待游戏开始" y="922" width="410" textColor="0x030000" fontFamily="微软雅黑" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" height="110" x="115"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSceneSkin" width="640" height="1136" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect height="1136" width="640" fillColor="0x6FEAEA"/>
	<e:Label id="progressLabel" text="标签" y="705" textColor="0x020000" size="30" width="424" horizontalCenter="0" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" height="128"/>
	<e:Image source="preload_title_png" width="516" height="150" horizontalCenter="0" top="40"/>
	<e:Image source="preload_foot_png" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image source="preload_logo_png" verticalCenter="-81.5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HeadUISkin" width="220" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label y="9" textColor="0x000000" height="40" text="标签标签标签标签" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="85" width="128" size="18" id="nameLabel" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"/>
	<e:Label id="rankLabel" y="54" textColor="0x000000" height="23" text="标签标签标签标" fontFamily="微软雅黑" x="85" width="130" size="18" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
</e:Skin>
